T02D3143:162b-1: a'arya buddha aa nu smri ti /
T02D3143:162b-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa /
T02D3143:162b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3143:162b-5: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D3143:162b-6: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D3143:162b-7: rgyas te / rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
T02D3143:162b-8: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
T02D3143:162b-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
T02D3143:162b-11: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
T02D3143:162b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
T02D3143:162b-14: bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa /
T02D3143:162b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba /
T02D3143:162b-17: bsod nams kyi gter rnams kyi gzhi /
T02D3143:162b-18: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa /
T02D3143:162b-19: mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa spyod yul ran par mthun pa /
T02D3143:162b-20: mthong na mi mthun pa med pa /
T02D3143:162b-21: dad pas mos pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba /
T02D3143:162b-22: shes rab zil gyis mi non pa /
T02D3143:162b-23: stobs rnams la brdzi ba med pa /
T02D3143:162b-24: sems can thams cad kyi ston pa /
T02D3143:162b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab /
T02D3143:162b-26: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po /
T02D3143:162b-27: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon /
T02D3143:162b-28: ye shes dpag tu med pa /
T02D3143:162b-29: spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
T02D3143:162b-32: sku byad blta bas chog mi shes pa /
T02D3143:162b-33: sku mtshungs pa med pa 'dod pa dag gis mgos pa /
T02D3143:162b-34: gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa /
T02D3143:162b-35: gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa /
T02D3143:162b-36: phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol ba ;
T02D3143:162b-37: khams rnams dang mi ldan pa /
T02D3143:162b-39: mdud pa rnams shin tu chad pa /
T02D3143:162b-40: yongs su gdung ba dag las rnam par grol ba /
T02D3143:162b-41: sred pa las yongs su grol ba /
T02D3143:162b-43: ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa /
T02D3143:162b-44: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /
T02D3143:162b-45: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la gnas pa /
T02D3143:162b-46: mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa /
T02D3143:162b-47: yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa sems
T02D3143:162b-48: can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa
